title: Marykeller
author: Marykeller
created_time: February 20, 2023, 10:57:33 AMLast edit: February 20, 2023, 11:14:44 AM by Marykeller
content: As I take see am for twitter @truthfully83 concerning the whole woroworo(problems) wey we d experience for the country. I no weda em make sense as I wan share am here cos the matter too long. Raising from new naira policy, redesign, cashless policy, 2023 election and who Buhari d back to be our next president. QuoteFor the sake of these two , Buhari will do everything humanly possible within his powers, to see that Asiwaju Bola Ahmed Tinubu, their APC god, doesn't win the 2023 presidential election, through the back door. Buhari doesn't forgive, neither does he forget. The open betrayal of the process, by other Aspirants, in favour of Tinubu did not sit well with the likes of Ameachi, Osinbajo, lawan, & President Buhari. After voting, when the results trickled in, Buhari was seen to be virtually unhappy. But the president had his plans. The party primaries were over, Tinubu was declared as the winner, everyone returned back to their normal lives. So it was time for president Buhari to proof that he is truly the C-in-C, and Aso Rock still controls the political process in Nigeria.Buhari knew the likes of Elrufai, Ganduje, & co, can not win election, without riding on the backs of popular candidates, or vote buying. Because in their local domain, they are not popular without him. Many of them wouldn't have been governors, without Buhari in 2015.So Buhari promised to play his role as C-in-C, when the time is right. As they have denied him the right as president to choose his successor, they should also ensure that their candidate, wins the 2023 presidential election, through them. Under a free & fair electoral process.As far as he, president Muhammadu Buhari remains the president, he will deny their presidential candidate, all the instrumentality of states, including Federal might. That their candidate must win the presidential election under a free and fair electoral atmosphere.Tinubu became the new bride of APC politicians, he became the most important person in the party, as they all snubbed Buhari and Aso Rock, while they run and gather around Tinubu for political promises ahead of time. Even Tinubu himself also snubbed Buhari...As he shopped for his running mate, but Buhari wasn't bothered. If Buhari was to be informed of his vice presidential choice, he knows Buhari will never support a Muslim-Muslim ticket. Something Tinubu had proposed in 2015, but was vehemently rejected by Buhari.After settling for Kashim Shettima, and snubbing all the G9 governors, who stood by him, it was time to make political promises, and share positions to them ahead of time. For the real politics to begin. It was time to begin the real politics, on how to win the election.After trying all available permutations, on how to garner votes, to win the 2023 presidential election, the bulk eventually stopped at the front of President Mohammadu Buhari. As the most important person, Tinubu and the APC needs, if they must win the presidential election.Like dogs, those governors shamelessly returned back to Buhari, being led by Elrufai, to apologise to him, in order to make peace. To beg for his support as never before, so Asiwaju Ahmed Bola Tinubu, can win the 2023 presidential election. Buhari in his usual way, told them that he is not against Tinubu as the APC presidential candidate, neither is he against any of them. But what he will promise them is, Tinubu must contest and win the presidential election, in a free & fair atmosphere, without external advantage.Fearing for any uncertainty, Tinubu through APC governors, strategically distributed almost a trillion naira in cash, all around the country, for vote buying purposes. Because he was hell bent on winning the 2023 presidential election, no matter what.Emiefele being the Governor of CBN, got wind of the information, on how Tinubu, through APC governors have strategically distributed raw cash all around the country, for vote buying purposes. He took the information to Buhari, and showed him proof. Buhari was furious, but there is little or nothing he could do, because those governors had immunity protecting them, by the constitution. So Emiefele suggested a currency redesign, to stop them, and many more like them who are hoarding the naira from circulating.Currency redesign was long overdue, coupled with security reports before Buhari, on how bandits, kidnappers, militants, terrorist, and politicians are hoarding the naira, from circulation. Reducing the 3.32 trillion released by CBN into circulation, to just 500 billion only. Buhari hurriedly approved Emiefele proposal. To properly checkmate Tinubu and his vote buying Governors. The currency was hurriedly resigned, with just colour changes to the big denominations, with fewer amounts released into circulation, to quickly chackmate those politicians. Buhari gave Emiefele the approval to draft policy implementation, that will make vote buying almost impossible with the new naira note. That he will stand by him. That was why cash withdrawal limit, was added. To checkmate Tinubu, APC govs, & all those hoarding cash to buy votes. That reason why no matter how Nigerians cry, Buhari is not ready to shift grounds, to allow the use of those old currencies. Because he has concrete proof, as to how Tinubu through governors had strategically distributed raw cash, for vote buying. Despite court pronouncementLink for the ogbengeh information: https://mobile.twitter.com/Truthfully83/status/1627031529619685376Wetin be una take for this matter as the truth don reveal em self of how the kasala for the new naira notes and old currency take happen

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: This contri and there politics they after watin dem wan gain,. and godfatherism something. Since Buhari no fit put tinubu for the control nah why him dy fine means to mke sure say him no enter that seat.. the new note way we they talk abt way them redesign becuz of am I still see for news say them discover almost 400m of the new note for Bola Tinubu huz abi the news nah lie?

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: This politicians na bastards,them dey use we the citizens dey play dice game because of their selfish desire for power. I know get problem with the new redesigned note after I check the advantage of am for our economy. If na true say vote buying no go still dey,and free and fair election go take place,then any of the candidates wey win,I go accept am. Since this redesign issue come up last year, na e I don know say politics invovle for the game. Am Rufai order e state people to continue with the use of the old notes because na the old note for e possession na him,e won take buy vote on Saturday. Una see how God don set confusion for their midst,so that the right candidate go fit enter power. Wike know all these things no wonder e dey sing that song about confusion.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Una don start with all this una news again abeg make una allow us rest because no matter anything una do, I dey very sure say this men know wetin dem dey do and at the end of the day na only talk we get to talk and na we go still suffer consequences of all these their decisions and quarrels because e come be like say this men dey use us quarrel and take us still settle quarrel.My own be say if dem dey quarrel make dem try dey leave us out of am and do their things like men wey dem be because na we dey end up to suffer all this mess and judging from this story you share, buhari dey fear make dem no do am wetin him do Atiku by blocking the onne sea port so him dey fear make the next person no fustrate all him efforts.I hope we get our PVCs and go vote tye right person into power.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on February 20, 2023, 05:21:16 PMUna don start with all this una news again abeg make una allow us rest because no matter anything una do, I dey very sure say this men know wetin dem dey do and at the end of the day na only talk we get to talk and na we go still suffer consequences of all these their decisions and quarrels because e come be like say this men dey use us quarrel and take us still settle quarrel.My own be say if dem dey quarrel make dem try dey leave us out of am and do their things like men wey dem be because na we dey end up to suffer all this mess and judging from this story you share, buhari dey fear make dem no do am wetin him do Atiku by blocking the onne sea port so him dey fear make the next person no fustrate all him efforts.I hope we get our PVCs and go vote tye right person into power.Omo abeg na, no mak us lose hope abeg, we need am now pass anytime. Election don rch, we need perish d idea say dem go alway hav dere way nd try d right way one mor time, mak we see how e go b. We don too suffer 4 dis we nation, e don rch wen we 4 njoy small na.I knw say, dem dey always gt dere way around bt hopefully, d fear of a possible revolution future mak pple way dey collate result behav well nd we kwa, we need play a part of staying away frm anytin vote buying.Na social media age b dis, persn fit dey camera en polling unit nd upload online if e see any rubbish. Mak d world knw nd identify d election malpractice criminlals nd who knws, dem fit void results frm such unit.Anyhow e b, I go get more satisfaction if dis suffering of fuel nd naira scarcity ft yield gud result in d election nd better 4 our country. We don too dey day use 2 suffer, mak e no con become normal something.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: I no dy convinced about this naira redesign narrative by Buhari administration. How much politicians dey give people for polling unit to buy voteâ€¦ e no dey pass 10k so this stopping electoral fraud issue na story for the gods. To stop wayo for election, the electoral body inec na suppose dey on top the matter nor be Buhari because e go dey bias to favor him party or him preferred candidate. Quote from: Mr.right85 on February 20, 2023, 06:29:25 PMNa social media age b dis, persn fit dey camera en polling unit nd upload online if e see any rubbish. Mak d world knw nd identify d election malpractice criminlals nd who knws, dem fit void results frm such unit..Abeg as you dey video make you still dey safe you know say bad boys dey full the town that day. We nor even dey sure say if person upload electoral fraud for him polling unit weda inec go accept to gree disqualify that polling unit.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: All this old men no go allow us rest, buhari buy votes to win elections, yet en no want make tinubu buy votes to win his, based on say en know say tinubu no go pay am regards.Emifele (CBN governor) get intention too to be president through APC, so as en no fit get the opportunity nai make en dey do everything possible to frustrate tinubu efforts to be president, and en feel say the best way na to go change currency, and na there dem make mistake, because it's well known say tinubu don stock 400billion of the new naira notes inside en house, buhari give order to EFCC to go raid tinubu house, yesterday the efcc chairman (Abdulrasheed Bawa) talk for radio say Dem no raid tinubu house oo, say nothing like that happen,My question now be say who this old men dey fool?Who Dem dey play games with? Because of their own selfish interest,The one wey dey pain me pass now be say, our own Rivers State governor (nyisom wike) dey campaign for tinubu, dey beg Rivers State people to vote tinubu, because him get problems with Atiku (PDP presidential candidate) and en no want make Atiku win, because if atiku win, him wey be wike go go jail,All this Politicians just dey for their interest and not the citizens, so make all dem go sleep abeg, we know dem better, we go use our PVC vote for who we want and not who go favour politicians...

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Things no balance well at all. This matter na do me I do you God no go vex. They undermined the power of the President and here we are today battling with money circulation. If we are to go by this news and it happens to be real then my assumptions were all correct as it is because of one man the whole country is going through this currency swap issues. I have had this thought over and over again what prompted this act from the president to approve the currency redesign by this time? Wouldn't have been better they did it earlier 2022 but it was towards election they had to hurriedly redesign the currency for swapping. I had sensed this for long now but some how it will check mate financial activities in the country and for those who are preparing for vote buying, it would not be business as usual. The game has changed, go win your election fir yourself without vote buying.
